authentication propertiesconfiguringConfigure authentication properties in the configuration file, $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties.
When you use file-based authentication, you can use the Basic, Digest, or Form type. By default, uses file-based authentication and uses the Form authentication type.

step.cmd: In the configuration file, $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties, enable file-based authentication by setting the http.authentication.login.module property to file.
In the $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties file, define the HTTP authentication type by setting the http.authentication property to basic, digest, or form.

Specify whether checks the permissions for the associated realm.properties file for the type of authentication that you use. Set the http.realm.file.permission.check property to one of the following values:

choices.choice: true to ensure that the realm.properties file allows access only to the owner.
false to skip the permission check.

step.info: You'll use the realm.properties file in the next step, when you configure users and roles.
